Strings.text: Reply and amend ticket status to
Find Client by ID, name or email
An account with that email address already exists, please login before creating the ticket.
Set the number of seconds a ticket has to be inactive before automatically closing the ticket.
AUTOMATED MESSAGE: This thread has been closed due to inactivity.

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Support Ticket Reply Notification
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your support ticket at {{settings.general.sitename}} has had a new post and the status is now {{status}}.

You can view the ticket by visiting the following link: {{ticket_url}} or see the message below.

{{{ticket_post}}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your support ticket at {{settings.general.sitename}} has had a new post and the status is now {{status}}.

You can view the ticket by visiting the following link: {{ticket_url}} or see the message below.

{{{ticket_post}}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Support Ticket Reply Notification
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:

You can view the ticket by visiting the following link: {{ticket_url}} or see the message below.

{{{ticket_post}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Assigned to Support Ticket
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
You have been assigned to a support ticket at {{settings.general.sitename}}.

View the ticket at {{ticket_url}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
You have been assigned to a support ticket at {{settings.general.sitename}}.

View the ticket at {{ticket_url}}

You have been assigned to a support ticket at {{settings.general.sitename}}.

View the ticket at {{ticket_url}}
